rules_text:
Whenever another Subroutine you control enters, it runs. 
Whenever this Subroutine runs, create an X/X colorless Construct artifact creature token, where X is the number of Subroutines you control.
notes:
!tokens Program A ERR;Program B ERR;Program C ERR;colorless Construct XXERR
!
!tag promo
art4
promo
terminal
flagged (build-around)

!prepend (As this enters, insert it into one of your three programs. At your first main phase each turn, the next program runs all its Subroutines.)\n
